text: @realDonaldTrump Hillary Clinton: “South Korea and the US had their first reported case of COVID-19 on the same day. Today, SK has reduced daily cases by 90%. In the US, 70,000 have died and unemployment has hit 14.7%. The difference: Competent government that heeds experts. Vote 4 that in Nov.”
